mapper.select: SELECT tok.* ,cod.code_label AS talkKindTitle ,acnt.account_key ,acnt.human_name ,fle.file_url FROM tb_talk tok LEFT JOIN tb_code cod ON cod.p_code = 'TALK_KIND' and cod.code = tok.talk_kind LEFT JOIN tb_account acnt ON acnt.account_id = tok.writer_id LEFT JOIN tb_file fle ON fle.link_info = 'talkMainImage' and fle.link_key = tok.talk_id WHERE talk_id = #{talkId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_talk SET use_fg = 0 WHERE talk_id = #{talkId}
